entry.title: New release for Jelly Music App: v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Offline Sync - Download songs, albums, playlists, or artists for offline playback, perfect for uninterrupted listening. - Auto-Sync automatically fetches newly added tracks for saved playlists, albums, or artists. - Persistent Queue ensures downloads resume seamlessly across sessions. - Supports direct streams or transcoded audio with adjustable bitrate for tailored playback quality, balancing audio fidelity with storage efficiency.

Enhancements & Fixes - Added ascending/descending sorting and improved queue page, including artist/album playlist integration. - Polished app interface with refined dropdown menus and enhanced audio playback and storage stability. - General bug fixes and performance optimizations for a smoother experience. - Docker support for easy self-hosting with Jellyfin server URL.

New Contributors

Thanks to our new contributors: @seijihariki: Docker support @melisa-abuin: Filter state changes and sorting enhancements

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stannnnn/jelly-app/compare/08ee642c81a570fd1ba591480fce0103f23f534f...777fb899038aaa392d10a816d263dafa970f41a6

entry.title: New release for Jelly Music App: v0.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Lyrics

  • Introducing a new way to enjoy your favorite songs, with a spectacular UI showing perfectly timed lyrics that appear line-by-line as you listen. Lyrics that aren't synchronized are still displayed as a normal list.
  • Access to lyrics appears elegantly once available, tucked in the sidenav next to settings.

Crossfade

  • Smoothly transition between tracks for a seamless and immersive listening experience. Crossfade is now available in Settings.

Queue

  • Queue page has been vastly improved & revamped, it is now in a stable state.
  • Added drag-and-drop functionality to effortlessly reorder tracks, works effortlessly on both Desktop and Mobile alike.
  • Lots of bug fixes and improvements for a more reliable queue management experience.

Docker

  • Introducing a new Docker image for easier setup and deployment, more info can be found in the README.

Enhancements & Fixes

  • Instant Mix is now available as a standalone page.
  • Dedicated Album Artists page.
  • Added new 'name' filter to sorting options.
  • Enhanced favorites page with more granular filtering for a personalized browsing experience.
  • Completely reworked shuffle functionality, new and improved
  • Better error handling
  • Many general bugfixes, improvements, optimizations and overall UI polish

Thanks to @seijihariki for implementing the lyrics functionality and helping with docker support

New Contributors

  • @Dissem made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stannnnn/jelly-app/pull/14 - improving docker support

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stannnnn/jelly-app/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

entry.title: New release for Jelly Music App: v0.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Now Playing

  • A dedicated playback page with an improved look and feel for individual tracks.
  • Features a new lyrics page, optimized for desktop and mobile devices.
  • Enhanced playback experience for mobile and touch devices.
  • Available in the bottom-right corner, next to the track duration.

Desktop Apps

  • Desktop applications, built with Tauri for native-like performance, are now available for Linux, macOS, and Windows.

Instant Mix

  • Now available with a new look, similar to how playlists are displayed.

Enhancements & Fixes.

  • Added standalone desktop apps #6.
  • Fix safe-area spacing for mobile and touch devices #23.
  • Docker ARM support #24.
  • Progress bar is now draggable/swipeable on iOS.
  • General bugfixes & improvements, focusing on accessibility and more.

Thanks to @seijihariki for helping with the dedicated desktop apps, arm support for docker images and automated deployments!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stannnnn/jelly-app/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0
